westMacedonia.title: West Macedonia
westMacedonia.description: West Macedonia is a region of Greece known for its rich mineral waters and springs. The area is ideal for hydrogen production due to its unique geological structure and natural resources.

milestones.description: Started research on water sources in West Macedonia

milestones.title: Source Discovery
milestones.description: Identification of multiple sources with high mineral content

milestones.title: Technology Development
milestones.description: Development of new technology for hydrogen extraction from sources

transportation.mainDescription: West Macedonia is easily accessible through various modes of transportation. From flights to driving, you can choose the way that suits you best.

features.title: Flights
features.description: Kastoria Airport offers daily flights from Athens and Thessaloniki. There are also seasonal flights from various European cities.

features.title: Car
features.description: The region is well connected to the national road network. You can reach it from Athens in about 6 hours and from Thessaloniki in about 2 hours.

features.title: Buses
features.description: There are regular bus services from major Greek cities to West Macedonia.

features.title: Trains
features.description: The rail network connects West Macedonia with other regions of Greece.

features.title: Local Transport
features.description: There are taxis and local buses for transportation within the region.

features.title: Future Outlook
points: Breathing Cleaner Air: Enhanced oxygenation for the brain and body
Holistic Health: A balance between environment and well-being
Preventive Care: Reducing chronic illnesses through clean technologies

features.title: Important Information
points: Check flight times before your trip
Book your car in advance during peak season

transportation.conclusion: Choose the mode of transportation that suits you best and enjoy your journey to West Macedonia!
